item.title: Report X-2024100686
item.description:
Report X-2024100686

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-12T21:13:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-05
  • City: DENVER
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On October 4th during the PM sort a package was discovered that had a distinct sound of an aerosol can. After calling DG Admin the station opened the package and found three cans of spray paint. There are no markings or labels on the outside of the package that indicates the package contains any dangerous goods, however a safety data sheet classifies these as UN1950, Aerosols, flammable, 2.1. The package is being help pending investigation of the FAA.

item.title: Report E-2024100294
item.description:
Report E-2024100294

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-11T09:22:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-08
  • City: SEDGWICK
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 15000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal XGN experienced an over the road UN1197 Caramel FMF Liquid Conc Flavor release from a 30- gallon poly tote. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 5-gallons of product released to a 4’ x 5’ area of the trailer floor. The material was transferred from the damaged tote into a new one for shipment on. Absorbents were then worked into the impacted trailer floor to clean the release. The damaged empty tote was cut up and containerized along with all impacted absorbents, pads, and PPE into a 95-gallon poly drum. The waste was removed from site pending disposal.
